priogrid: PRIO-GRID Replication Code

Source: R/priogrid-package.R
priogrid-package.Rd

Codebase for building PRIO-GRID from a diverse set of raw data.

See also

Useful links:

  • http://prio-data.github.io/priogrid/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/prio-data/priogrid/issues
